column2: ENGLISH
Plot Uncovered
The rumors about a plot brewing here in [Root.Location.GetName] seems to be true.
Hopefully I can uncover it in time.

It seems that [From.GetTitledName], the spymaster of [From.Liege.GetTitledName], has been sent to [From.Location.GetName] to investigate rumors of a plot... Maybe he should be silenced before he finds out about my plot to [Root.GetPlot].
That might be necessary...
Have him killed immediately!
Better not risk it.

column1: # Assassination attempt on the spymaster fails

column2: I caught a man trying to assassinate me! It turns out he was sent by [From.GetTitledName] to make sure I wouldn't find out about his plot to [From.GetPlot].
I must report this to my liege!

column1: # Spymaster informs liege about assassination attempt and plot

column2:
My liege,
I write to you with shocking news! [FromFrom.GetTitledName] tried to have me assassinated to make sure I wouldn't discover [FromFrom.GetHerHis] plot to [FromFrom.GetPlot].

Your humble Spymaster,
[From.GetTitledName]
Expose [FromFrom.GetHerHim] immediately!
I will keep this information to myself...
I am shocked and appalled to find out that you have not only tried to assassinate my spymaster [FromFrom.GetTitledName], but are also plotting to [Root.GetPlot]!
Most unfortunate...

column1: # The Spymaster is attacked by a Noble's thugs (Gets away, Is wounded, Is maimed, Is killed)

column2: Thugs Attack the Spymaster
My investigation into the rumor of a plot in [Root.Location.GetName] must have alerted someone. Armed thugs are breaking into my room!
Will I escape with my life?
[Root.GetTitledName] gets away
[Root.GetTitledName] gets wounded
I managed to flee the thugs by escaping through the backdoor.
My prestige however did not go unscathed by the incident...
I did manage to survive the thugs attacking me, but the incident has left me severely wounded.
I am lucky to be alive...
I must send a letter to inform my liege

My liege,
Armed thugs attacked me while investigating the rumor of a plot in [From.Location.GetName]! I barely escaped with my life and am now severely wounded.

Your humble Spymaster,
[From.GetTitledName]
Sinister forces are at work!
[Root.GetTitledName], your Spymaster [From.GetTitledName] was killed by armed thugs when investigating a rumor about a plot in [From.Location.GetName].
Horrible!

column1: # Faction Prevention - Spymaster finds Faction Member

column2: Vassal Discouraged from Joining Factions

You have spent some time investigating one of your liege's vassals in [Root.Location.GetName], and you feel that you have gathered enough information to gain a leverage that would discourage the vassal from supporting conspiratorial factions in the future.
My liege must be informed.
Your liege is informed.

My liege,

I believe that one of your vassals can be discouraged from associating with conspiratorial factions if the proper leverage is obtained. How do you wish to proceed?

Your humble Spymaster,
[From.GetTitledName]
Blackmail the vassal.
You use blackmail to gain a leverage on your vassal.
Obligate the vassal.
You use legalism to gain a leverage on your vassal.
Threaten the vassal.
You use threats to gain a leverage on your vassal.
Ask politely.
You forward a polite request.
We will do nothing for now.

My dear [Root.GetTitle],

I regret that events have forced me to sully my hands in this manner, but unless you swear not to form new factions conspiring against me, I shall have to spread your unsavory secrets to anyone willing to listen.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
My preferences in bed must not be revealed...
Others may not understand the wonders of impalement...
My desires might make others think less of me...
If the full extent of my drinking problem became known...
I have not exactly led the most pious life...
My little problem must not be revealed...
You decide it would be in your best interest to comply with this demand.

Honoured [Root.GetTitle],

Though I curse your name, I will comply with your unfair demand. Just... keep the sensitive information to yourself.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

My dear [Root.GetTitle],

Permit me to remind you of your obligations and duties as my sworn vassal. To form a conspiratorial faction would be in direct violation of these, and I must ask for your promise never to do so.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
True. Scheming is not the honorable way of doing things.
Yes, enough lies and scheming.
Perhaps you are right, my liege.
Oh well. I wasn't planning on doing that anyway.
True. Founding such a faction wouldn't be very nice of me.

Honoured [Root.GetTitle],

Thank you for reminding me of my duties and obligations as your vassal. You are right, of course. For the foreseeable future, you have my promise not to support factions conspiring against you.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
Very good.

My dear [Root.GetTitle],

If you think I let any vassal of mine support factions conspiring against me without taking action, you are sorely mistaken. If you value your wretched life, you will swear not to form any such faction.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
Oh my! I swear it! I swear it!!
I know [From.GetSheHe] isn't bluffing...
It's not worth dying for if there's no afterlife...
There is no shame in backing down over this...
Forming a faction is too much work anyway...

Honoured [Root.GetTitle],

I ask your forgiveness if I have done something to offend. I obviously wouldn't dream of associating with any faction conspiring against you or your enlightened rule.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
You are forgiven.

My dear [Root.GetTitle],

I have learned that there are certain factions within the realm working to undermine my rule. If you are involved or planning to become so, I trust that your complicity in these matters ends now.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
Best not to risk it...
Ha! This letter was an act of desperation.
You refuse this outrageous demand.

Honoured [Root.GetTitle],

Do not speak to me of obligations and duties! I may be your vassal, but that does not make me your slave. I am within my full right to associate with whichever faction I wish.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
That little...!

Honoured [Root.GetTitle],

Your pitiful threats against myself and my loved ones have revealed your true nature once and for all. I shall never submit. Do your worst.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
The insolence!

column1: # Faction Recruitment - Spymaster finds Faction Member

column2: Noble Encouraged to Join Your Faction

You have spent some time in [Root.Location.GetName], and you feel that you have found a promising candidate for membership in potential factions supported by your liege. A small amount of persuation will be necessary, however.
I will inform my liege at once.

My liege,

I have discovered a promising candidate that could potentially be strong-armed into joining factions that you support. How do you wish to proceed?

Your humble Spymaster,
[From.GetTitledName]
Blackmail the noble.
You use blackmail to gain a leverage on the noble.
Threaten the noble.
You use threats to gain a leverage on the noble.
Obligate the noble.
You use legalism to gain a leverage on the noble.
No, let us not go down this path...

Honored [Root.GetTitle],

Though I curse your name, I will promise to support any faction of yours when called upon. Just... keep the sensitive information to yourself.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

Honored [Root.GetTitle],

Fine! I do not like this, but for the sake of the continued prosperity of the realm, I will agree to support any faction of yours. Please don't make me regret this.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

Honored [Root.GetTitle],

Your legalistic nonsense will not be enough to manipulate me into picking up your banner. I will not pledge unquestioning support to your schemes.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

Honored [Root.GetTitle],

I obviously stand together with you and your confederates. Before you do something hasty that we shall both regret, permit me to offer my pledge to support your faction when called upon.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
Wise choice.
Perhaps it is best not to take a chance on this...
Perhaps [From.GetSheHe] has a point...
Ha!
No point in risking my neck over this.
Do your worst.

Honored [Root.GetTitle],

Your pitiful threats have revealed your true nature once and for all. I shall never submit. Do your worst.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
Spymaster Study Technology

The people of [Root.Location.GetName] have progressed beyond our own technological level. But I have managed to study their advancements and I will gladly share this information with my liege [Root.Liege.GetTitledName].
This should please [Root.Liege.GetHerHim]!
Send a letter to [Root.Liege.GetTitledName]!

column1: # The Spymaster informs his liege of the success

column2:
My liege, the people of [From.Location.GetName] have progressed beyond our own technological level. I have managed to study their advancements and the documents enclosed here should help us reach their level. I hope you will find this to your satisfaction.

Your humble Spymaster,
[From.GetTitledName]
Wonderful!

column1: # The Spymaster is discovered by the local count - chance of imprisonment

column2: Spymaster Discovered!
A noble in [Root.Location.GetName] caught me while I was spying there!
This will not be good...
The noble takes action
[From.Liege.GetTitledName]'s spymaster [From.GetTitledName] was found spying in [From.Location.GetName]!
Let [From.GetHerHim] rot in jail!
A letter is sent to [From.Liege.GetTitledName]
What is done is done. Let [From.GetHerHim] go.
A letter is sent to [From.GetTitledName]

column1: # Liege get the news - Chancellor Imprisoned

column2:
I received word that your spymaster [FromFrom.GetTitledName] has been spying in one of my counties. This is intolerable and as to stop further interference I have arrested [FromFrom.GetHerHim]!

Signed 
[From.GetTitledName]
Most unfortunate...
How dare [From.GetSheHe] arrest my spymaster!

column1: # Spymaster get the news: is free to go

column2:
I received word that you have been spying in one of my counties. I will let it pass. This time.

Signed 
[From.GetTitledName]
Thank you!
Vicious Rumors Spread

My network of spies in [Root.Location.GetName] have investigated a local noble and it turns out that he prefers the company of men... By threating to spread this rumor, my liege might be able to extort the favours or money from him.
I will pass this on.

My liege, my network of spies here in [From.Location.GetName] have found out that a local noble is a homosexual. What should I do with this information?

Your humble Spymaster,
[From.GetTitledName]
Blackmail him!
Spread rumors about him.
Nothing, let it be
The rumor reaches the Noble's ears
My liege's instructions are clear. I should blackmail the noble and extort some money for my silence.
It will cost him dearly...

[From.GetTitledName], the spymaster of [From.Liege.GetTitledName], has somehow found out about my sexual preferences and demands a large sum of money to not spread this rumor and destroy my reputation among my vassals.
Then I will have to pay...
Try to have [From.GetTitledName] killed!
[This.GetTitledName] getting away.
[This.GetTitledName] getting killed.
Let them spread their rumor
[From.GetTitledName] accepted my demands and was willing to pay to keep me silent.
This should please my liege

column1: # Liege is informed that blackmail succeeded

column2:
My liege, I have good news! I have succeeded in extorting a large sum of money from [FromFrom.GetTitledName] by promising not to spread the rumor about his alleged homosexuality.

Your humble Spymaster,
[From.GetTitledName]
The local noble, [From.GetTitledName], tried to assure that I couldn't spread any rumors about him by sending some thugs to attack me!
Luckily I got away!
They killed me?!

My liege, the local noble here in [From.Location.GetName], [FromFrom.GetTitledName], tried to silence me by sending some thugs to kill me! Luckily I managed to get away. I will go ahead and spread the rumor about his sexual preferences and destroy his reputation among his vassals.

Your humble Spymaster,
[From.GetTitledName]
You have my blessing!

column1: # The noble is informed that the rumor has been spread

column2: [From.GetTitledName] and [From.GetHerHis] spymaster went ahead and spread the rumors about me being a homosexual. Those of my vassals who did not like me before seem to like me even less after this incident...
A most unfortunate incident
My spymaster, [From.GetTitledName] has been murdered! That noble he was investigating, [FromFrom.GetTitledName], seems reasonable to be behind this, but I have no proof...
Damn him anyway!
My liege's instructions are clear. I will put my spy network to work spreading the rumor about the local noble.
It will be my pleasure

[From.GetTitledName], the spymaster of [From.Liege.GetTitledName], has somehow found out about my sexual preferences and is now trying to spread a rumor about this to destroy my reputation among my vassals.
Try to have [From.GetTitledName] killed!
Let them spread their rumor
[FromFrom.GetTitledName] managed to get away...
Damn [FromFrom.GetHerHim]!
The men I sent to deal with [FromFrom.GetTitledName] succeeded. [From.GetSheHeCap] will not bother me again...
My liege [From.GetTitledFirstName] seems to have lost interest in this noble and wants me to forget the whole thing.
As [From.GetSheHe] wish.

column1: # The noble does not care about the rumor

column2: It seems [From.GetTitledName] does not care if I spread the rumor or not. I think [From.GetSheHe] will regret [From.GetHerHis] choice.
I will inform my liege

column1: # Inform the liege that the noble does not care about the rumor

column2:
My liege, it seems that [FromFrom.GetTitledName] does not care if I spread the rumor or not about his alleged homosexuality. But I think he will regret his choice once I have informed his vassals.

Your humble Spymaster,
[From.GetTitledName]
So do I
Corruption Uncovered
My network of spies have encountered vague rumors that a local noble might be corrupt. Used wisely this might be enough to implicate one of my liege's enemies here in [Root.Location.GetName].
My liege will know what to do

My liege, there is a rumor here in [From.Location.GetName] that one of the local nobles might be corrupt. Handled wisely this information might be used to implicate one of your enemies here.

Your humble Spymaster,
[From.GetTitledName]
Then use it as you see fit
It is just a rumor, let it be
My liege's instructions are clear. I should use the rumor about corruption to try and implicate one of [From.GetHerHis] enemies here in [Root.Location.GetName].
It will be my pleasure

[From.GetTitledName], the spymaster of [From.Liege.GetTitledName], has somehow connected a rumor about corruption here in [From.Location.GetName] with me. It seems they try to hurt my reputation with my vassals and wants me to confess.
Try to have [From.GetTitledName] killed!
I guess I do not have a choice
The local noble, [From.GetTitledName], tried to assure that I couldn't spread any rumors about him by sending some thugs to attack me!
Luckily I got away!
They killed me?!

My liege, the local noble here in [From.Location.GetName], [FromFrom.GetTitledName], tried to silence me by sending some thugs to kill me! Luckily I managed to get away. I will go ahead and spread the rumor about [FromFrom.GetHerHis] corruption and destroy [FromFrom.GetHerHis] reputation among [FromFrom.GetHerHis] vassals.

Your humble Spymaster,
[From.GetTitledName]
You have my blessing!
My spymaster, [From.GetTitledName] has been murdered! That noble he was investigating, [FromFrom.GetTitledName], seems reasonable to be behind this, but I have no proof...
Damn him anyway!
[FromFrom.GetTitledName] managed to get away...
Damn [FromFrom.GetHerHim]!
The men I sent to deal with [FromFrom.GetTitledName] succeeded. [From.GetSheHeCap] will not bother me again...
The rumors about me being corrupt is of course false, but I realize that you already know this and that I do not have much of a choice. So it is with regret that I have to 'confess' to this crime...
This should satisfy my liege!

column1: # Spymaster report to liege about confession

column2:
My liege, [FromFrom.GetTitledName] decided to not risk upsetting his vassals and confessed to the allegations of corruption. It will take some time before [FromFrom.GetHerHis] prestige recovers and I have with me the fine I collected.

Your humble Spymaster,
[From.GetTitledName]
My liege seems to have lost interest in this noble and wants me to forget the whole thing.
As [From.GetSheHe] wish
It's nothing but a bluff.
